qas.question: in what year did the UK annex the islands?
where did the UK rule the islands from?
In what year did the islands annex the United Kingdom?
From where did the islands rule the United Kingdom?
When were the islands annexed by Napoleon Bonaparte?
Where was the prison of Tristan da Cunha located?
What prevented the US from using Napoleon Bonaparte as a cruiser base?

context: In <a0_0><b2_0><b4_0>1816<b4_0/><b2_0/><a0_0/>, the United Kingdom annexed the islands, ruling them from the <b3_0>Cape Colony in <a1_0>South Africa<b3_0/><a1_0/>. This is reported to have primarily been a measure to ensure that the French would be unable to use the islands as a base for a rescue operation to free Napoleon Bonaparte from his prison on <b5_0>Saint Helena<b5_0/>. <b6_0>The occupation<b6_0/> also prevented the United States from using Tristan da Cunha as a cruiser base, as it had during the War of 1812.
